name: Derakor the Vindicator
notes: Storm Giant warrior. Window opens roughly 7 hours after death and closes around 9 hours.

name: Phara Dar
notes: Lava dragon cleric. Summons, enrages, immune to charm, fear, mez, and stun. Casts Stun Breath and Dragon Charm.

name: The Statue of Rallos Zek
notes: Rallos Zek warrior. Flurries, enrages, summons, sees invis. Immune to flee, charm, fear, snare, mez, and stun.
